#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int n,b,d,p[100],q[100],y,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&b,&d);

        for(i=0;i<d;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld %lld",&p[i],&q[i]);


        }
        for(i=d-1;i>=0;i--)
        {

            if(b>=p[i])
               b+=q[i]-p[i]+1;

        }
        if(b<=n)
            printf("%lld\n",b);
        else
            printf("-1\n");

    }

}
